original_text:
and its canals will become foul,
    and the branches of Egypt's Nile will diminish and dry up,
    reeds and rushes will rot away.
korean_text: 강들에서는 악취가 나겠고 애굽의 강물은 줄어들고 마르므로 갈대와 부들이 시들겠으며

sentences.original_text: and its canals will become foul
and the branches of Egypt's Nile will diminish and dry up
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 나일의 지류들은 줄어들어 마를 것

sentences.original_text: reeds and rushes will rot away.
